function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of space management in commercial buildings leading to overcrowding and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among occupants and visitors.","Mitigation":"Implementing a space management strategy to reduce overcrowding, providing separate rooms, and considering ventilation and airflow.","Technologies":"Space management software, occupancy sensors, and air quality monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and facility management staff.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and designers."},{"Description":"Limited budget and low innovation and technology in facility management services due to the pandemic.","Impact":"Inability to meet health and safety needs, increased risk of disease transmission, and reduced functionality of the building.","Mitigation":"Seeking cost-effective technology solutions, exploring value-driven approaches, and prioritizing health and safety investments.","Technologies":"Affordable technology solutions, value engineering, and innovative facility management tools.","People":"Facility management staff, building owners, and budget decision-makers.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and budget decision-makers."},{"Description":"Increased workload and need for regular maintenance among blue-collar workers in commercial buildings.","Impact":"Fatigue, decreased productivity, and increased risk of maintenance-related accidents and errors.","Mitigation":"Implementing workload management strategies, providing training and support, and prioritizing worker health and safety.","Technologies":"Workload management software, training and support platforms, and safety equipment.","People":"Blue-collar workers, facility management staff, and building owners.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and workplace health and safety managers."}]}
